content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Orchestrator is a solution for multi-tenant virtual infrastructure management, monitoring and control on a self-service basis.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Orchestrator supports a number of native tools designed for convenient and efficient VM management. The most significant of them are listed below:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cloud Management Console (Web UI)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Each Cloud user has access to the EPAM Cloud Web UI, a user-friendly and transparent interface for virtual resource management. Easy navigation and various wizards make Cloud resources management intuitive and streamlined. Using Orchestrator via the Web UI requires no downloads or installations. Cloud Management Console is available both as a desktop and mobile interface\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Maestro CLI.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" For users preferring to work via a command line, EPAM Orchestrator has a native CLI tool, Maestro CLI, which requires client download and installation. Maestro CLI has a strict command syntax and a comprehensive help system suggesting the correct format of commands and parameters. The Maestro CLI functionality is somewhat wider than that of the Web UI. For example, personal project management is available only via Maestro CLI\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Maestro API.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM Orchestrator operates via a RESTful API consisting of a number of methods intended to achieve certain results and accompanied by a set of parameters. Successfully executed method requests result in certain actions or events. EPAM Orchestrator provides a Maestro API SDK allowing the developers to configure the API methods according to their purposes\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Stacks and Stack Builder.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM Orchestrator has a tool allowing to execute a certain sequence of actions automatically. This tool is called Maestro Stacks which is exactly that – a stack of Maestro commands performed one after the other with the possibility of setting custom parameters. This tool is especially efficient in running platform services, where you have to first start a VM of a specific configuration and then deploy a particular application and perform configurations\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Audit.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" The Audit functionality allows monitoring the status and events of your virtual infrastructure. Using Audit, you will always know when a certain event occurred on your VM and which user initiated it\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitoring.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You can monitor the performance of your VM using one of the monitoring tools supported by EPAM Orchestrator. As soon as you launch your VM, you have a default Chef monitoring service requiring no manual setup and available via the Web UI. Additionally, you can launch a Zabbix monitoring service which runs on a separate VM per each project and has an own Web UI\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Healthcheck.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" The Healthcheck Dashboard is specially designed to display an overview of all EPAM virtualization regions showing whether a region is available or not. You can immediately check if your region is affected by any service interruption and plan your work accordingly\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dynamic Dashboard.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM Orchestrator Web UI supports dynamic layout of your dashboard displaying, on one hand, only the action buttons available to the user by permissions and, on the other hand, the custom buttons added by the user. This way, the Dashboard is not cluttered by unnecessary elements and has all required components\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Management Tools.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM Cloud is a paid service, therefore, it is important to keep track of the resource usage and to estimate the planned costs. EPAM Orchestrator has a number of tools designed to control the resource usage. You can request various reports showing your VM costs broken down into different categories. Additionally, you can plan your virtual resources using the online Cost Estimator to compare VM costs in different configurations and usage routines. Managers can assign and modify user permissions allowing or denying certain actions to users as well as set resource usage quotas to limit virtual infrastructure use\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
